description:
# FieldErrors

Renders error messages based on error object configuration.
Provides backwards compatibility with UI-Kit FieldErrors while integrating
with Nimbus design system patterns.

Supports custom error renderers and localized built-in error messages
for common validation scenarios like missing required fields.

unstyled.description: If `true`, the element will opt out of the theme styles.
unstyled.name: unstyled

errors.description: Object mapping error types to boolean values indicating presence
errors.name: errors

isVisible.description: Whether the error messages are visible
isVisible.name: isVisible

renderError.description: Custom render function for error messages
renderError.name: renderError

renderDefaultError.description: Default render function for error messages when no custom renderer is provided
renderDefaultError.name: renderDefaultError

customMessages.description: Custom message overrides for specific error types
customMessages.name: customMessages

type.name: { missing?: ReactNode; invalid?: ReactNode; empty?: ReactNode; min?: ReactNode; max?: ReactNode; format?: ReactNode; duplicate?: ReactNode; ... 7 more ...; blocked?: ReactNode; }
